summary: Senior .Net developer with 10+ years experience in architecture analysis, software design and mentoring. Problem-solver with strong interpersonal and teamwork skills who is excited to work in agile and fast-paced team.

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
experience.description: Developing voice-bot using Asterisk + .NET 6.0, microservices and Kafka. Implemented RTP voice traffic real-time high-frequency, low-latency transfer between Asterisk and microservices (GRPC, multithreading).

experience.title: Lead Software Developer
experience.description: Developing & maintaining voice-bot (Postgres, .NET Core 3.1-5.0), Rest API, Razor & jQuery, Asterisk + .NET microservices, Kafka. Solo responsibility for architecture decisions and feature delivery; created own SIP-phone software server to reduce company costs by over 20%.

experience.title: C# Developer
experience.description: Developed & maintained TPP - Trust Protection Platform: cross-platform desktop app (WinForms & Xamarin Mac); web part (MsSql, .NET 4.6, Rest Api, jQuery, Backbone). Replaced shared files approach with .NET Standard for desktop app, reducing maintenance time by half.

experience.title: Senior .Net Developer
experience.description: Developing & maintaining ERP system for Russian hospitals (WinForms, MSSQL, MVC Razor & jQuery, DevExpress tools). Full responsibility for short-term development & feature delivery, supervision of junior developers.

experience.title: Middle .Net Developer (WPF)
experience.description: Developing desktop WPF applications for utility purposes (.NET 4.5). Creating MSI packages (InstallShield, WIX).
